channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Floating Chat Widget: Contact Chat Icons, Telegram Chat, Line, WeChat, Email, SMS, Call Button
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Floating Chat Widget: Contact Chat Icons, Telegram Chat, Line, WeChat, Email, SMS, Call Button

item.title: CVE-2022-3858|2024-08-03T01:20:58.467Z -- unknown -- floating%20chat%20widget%3A%20contact%20chat%20icons%2C%20telegram%20chat%2C%20line%2C%20wechat%2C%20email%2C%20sms%2C%20call%20button
item.description: The Floating Chat Widget: Contact Chat Icons, Telegram Chat, Line, WeChat, Email, SMS, Call Button WordPress plugin before 3.0.3 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as admin.
